item.title: How to Use Find
item.description: Find is frequently used to looking for a path of a file. Especially When I just want to use the cmd only, as I wanna be used to the way of non-gui handling on PC. Yes, I wanna be a dev. At least wanna keep my Terminali handling skill get improved. Well, So Find is the mostly used cmd, which is really good to know how to use it well.
